title: Conrad Aiken - Selected Poems PDF and other works
description:
Unfortunately, with the exception of Selected Poems (Harold Bloom), Conrad Aiken is out of print. The following is what I could find, though in the future I may plan on scanning his novels and short stories once I get my hands on them. All files are for the most part easily accessible already, however the following torrent may should make the search for them quicker and are collected for your convenience.

PDFs of the following:

Selected Poems - Conrad Aiken (with introduction by Harold Bloom)[PDF]
